title: Science Curriculum Utilizing a VR-Based Flow Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with VR device operation
context.additional_context: Immersive learning environment utilizing VR devices in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings. Continuous progress monitoring via formative assessments, with personalized feedback through teacher-learner interactions

learning_goals: Learners will explore and experiment with scientific phenomena in VR environments to explain scientific principles with over 80% accuracy.
Through a VR-based flow learning model, learners will maintain learning motivation by achieving immersion (flow state) of over 75%.
By incorporating formative feedback from problem-solving processes in VR simulations, learners will improve scientific problem-solving abilities by 40%.

resources: Smartphone-Compatible VR Devices (Cardboard, Low-Cost VR Headsets)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
